thread.section_title: GamerModz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GamerModz | gamermodz.com
thread.title: Alex Vanderende

author: Alex Vanderende
title: Alex Vanderende
text:
I ordered just parts and the A,B,X,Y bottons Were pretty sticky when pressing them. But I called up gamermodz and they said since I got chrome they might be a little sticky, because the chrome is thicker then most materials but they said sand off a bit of the sides or flex the shell of the controller to make them slide in easier.
Overall great service and products! ðŸ˜€
